alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 1:24PM MDT until June 28 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Johnson County in north central Wyoming... * Until 200 PM MDT. * At 124 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles east of Mayoworth, which is also 12 miles north of Kaycee, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Johnson County. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 261 and 268. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
